title: Ep. 166 S&A Investor - Stock Expert Chris Mayer Unplugged
itunes:title: Stock Expert Chris Mayer Unplugged
description: Chris Mayer, editor of the acclaimed Capital & Crisis newsletter, talks about one of his favorite emerging markets to invest in right now. He shares his methodology for picking stocks and shares some of his favorite small-cap ideas. Chris also tells you how to get a copy of his book, World Right Side Up - for free.
